unnormalised: Oi, Diwali shopping already breaking the bank? Well, hold onto your diyas folks, because gas cylinder prices just went up again! Bharat Gas, Indane, you name it, sabka rate badh gaya!
normalised: Oi, Diwali shopping already breaking the bank? Well, hold onto your diyas folks, because gas cylinder prices just went up again! Bharat Gas, Indane, you name it, sabka rate badh gaya!

unnormalised: Sources say domestic LPG cylinders in Delhi are now costing around Rs. 1150. No official statement yet from Dr. Puri at the Petroleum Ministry, but chai stalls are buzzing with the news.
normalised: Sources say domestic L P G cylinders in Delhi are now costing around rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty. No official statement yet from Doctor Puri at the Petroleum Ministry, but chai stalls are buzzing with the news.

unnormalised: "Yeh toh zulm hai!" exclaimed Kamla Aunty from Karol Bagh, whose monthly budget is already stretched thinner than a paratha.
normalised: "Yeh toh zulm hai!" exclaimed Kamla Aunty from Karol Bagh, whose monthly budget is already stretched thinner than a paratha.

unnormalised: Analysts are blaming international market volatility, but many feel the pinch is real. That new 2BHK flat in Gurgaon (900 sq ft) is looking less appealing when cooking gas is costing you a small fortune.
normalised: Analysts are blaming international market volatility, but many feel the pinch is real. That new two B H K flat in Gurgaon (nine hundred square feet) is looking less appealing when cooking gas is costing you a small fortune.

unnormalised: Hope they give us some relief before Bhai Dooj! Maybe a subsidy? Kuch toh karo, sarkar! We need to save money for ladoos, not just LPG!
normalised: Hope they give us some relief before Bhai Dooj! Maybe a subsidy? Kuch toh karo, sarkar! We need to save money for ladoos, not just L P G!
